name: Exposed (Fábio "Pyro" Dias, Jorge Silva)
description:
An infiltrated spy disguises himself as a candidate to a security position at an evil company, Company Inc.
His objective is to steal information about the company's evil doings but something goes wrong and he's exposed. Now he tries to escape, either by sneaking and avoid confrontations or shooting his way through.

Developer's note:
Our final project for the Game Development course at MasterD.
Jorge Silva was responsible for the first level;
Fábio "Pyro" Dias, was responsible for the second level, Labs;
Tiago Rente was responsible for the last level.

Hope you have fun and your feedback is highly appreciated!

Pyro
